function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variations in weather conditions impacting electricity use patterns","Impact":"Inaccurate data analysis and modeling, incorrect understanding of energy consumption trends","Mitigation":"Use weather-normalized data to accurately assess the impact of variations in weather conditions","Technologies":"Weather normalization techniques, statistical modeling, machine learning algorithms","People":"Data analysts, energy researchers, building management professionals","Owner":"Data analysts, energy researchers, building management professionals"},{"Description":"Increased total daily load in specific months","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and strain on infrastructure, potential impact on energy costs","Mitigation":"Implement energy efficiency measures and load management strategies, conduct energy audits to identify areas for improvement","Technologies":"Energy management systems, smart metering, demand response technologies","People":"Building owners, facility managers, energy efficiency consultants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, energy efficiency consultants"},{"Description":"Higher HVAC loads dominating summer electricity use patterns","Impact":"Higher energy consumption, increased strain on HVAC systems, potential impact on energy costs","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient HVAC systems, conduct regular maintenance and optimization of HVAC systems, use smart thermostats and occupant behavior strategies","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart thermostats, occupancy sensors","People":"HVAC contractors, building owners, facility managers","Owner":"HVAC contractors, building owners, facility managers"}]}
